page.shortlink: ux buttonlist data series mapping property
page.description: Whether or not a horizontal ButtonList control should fill the control's width.
page.discussion: If a ButtonList control is set to render horizontally, you can force the control to fill the defined [width]. For example, if the ButtonList's width is set to 100%, the ButtonList will fill the screen if the *[ui:Fill width]* property is checked.

section.description: The *[ui:Fill width]* proerty is also availabe for RadioButton and CheckBox controls that are configured to render as ButtonLists.

figure.title: ButtonList, RadioButton, and CheckBox controls set to fill the width of the screen.
